subject: URGENT: Your Bank Account Has Been Compromised!
body:
Dear Customer,

We have detected unauthorized activity on your account. Your BreezeLite online purchase has triggered our fraud alert system.

To restore access to your account and prevent further unauthorized charges, you must immediately verify your identity:

Click here to verify: http://verify-bank-account-urgent.com/security-check

You will need to provide:
- Your full name
- Social Security Number
- Bank account and routing numbers
- Credit card information

Fail to verify within 2 hours and your account will be permanently locked.

Urgently,
Bank Security Team
